text: Terry Sylvester's career started as a member of The Escorts, based in Liverpool, England. He left the Escorts in 1966 to join The Swinging Blue Jeans. In 1968, he joined the Hollies after Graham Nash left to create the band Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young. Sylvester left the Hollies in 1981. Category:English musicians
title: Terry Sylvester
